originalText.text: Dr. Newman and his staff are great. Very professional and courteous. My teeth have never felt so clean!

text.text: Dr. Newman and his staff are great. Very professional and courteous. My teeth have never felt so clean!

originalText.text: I have been trying to get an appointment for months!! THEY ARE ONLY OPEN ONE DAY A WEEK!!!! Not only do you have to call the only day they are open but the receptionist says she needs to call you back and never does. Then I had to wait another week to call again. Meanwhile this happened for weeks. Finally, they gave me an appt. but they were closed for a holiday. So it took 2 extra weeks to see me. Then I get there early for my appt and they tell me they are running behind. So i wait.... Then they tell me they can't see me after all and i have to reschedule!! That's it, I am done. I am finding another dentist. It took me 4 months of back and forth. why did i wait so long to change!

originalText.text: This place doesn't even deserve a star. The woman that answers the phone is very unprofessional. I waited over two months to schedule an appointment and it never happened. She states I'm going to call you back and never did. I report this dentist to my insurance.

originalText.text: Caring, always on time, no waiting, if you have an appointment Dr. Gil will never have you waiting. In pain Dr. Gil will get you out. Great dentist, amazing work with a fantastic sense of humor!
